rightClickAction.name: Right Click Action
rightClickAction.hint: What action should be performed when right-clicking while dragging a token?

tokenHighlighting.name: Use Token Speed Highlighting
tokenHighlighting.hint: When using the ruler, when do you want it to highlight a token's speed.

limitActions.name: Limit Actions
limitActions.hint: This will limit the number of actions available to a token for movement if they are slowed/stunned.

enableMovementHistory.name: Enable Combat Movement History
enableMovementHistory.hint: If enabled, PF2e Ruler will remember the path a token took during it's turn in combat.

showPlayerSpeeds.name: Show Player Speeds
showPlayerSpeeds.hint: If enabled, any player owned token will have it's speed highlighted even if a user doesn't have observer permission for that actor.

playerPathfinding.name: Enable Player Pathfinding
playerPathfinding.hint: When enabled it allows players access to pathfinding.

showGMRuler.name: Show GM Ruler
showGMRuler.hint: The ruler for GMs will be shown based on a token's disposition.
